file_content.text: When this is over, we'll make an accounting of what's here. I promise.
You wanted these relics preserved. Consider it done.
Thank you. I'm glad someone in the Republic doesn't need our whole history purged.
Thank you. I was the only one of my unit cleared to operate here... I was afraid the Republic would see our history purged.
Believe me, we're not forgetting the Empire any time soon.
Dark Lord! These will be studied and go to your vaults, I swear. The Reclamation Service will not fail you.
This is all the Revanites' fault. A thousand years of history treated like a battleground.
The Reclamation Service. You don't have anyone I can talk to? Someone who'll protect these ruins?
Sorry. The Republic doesn't have "combat archaeologists." Maybe because our history doesn't want to kill us.
Maybe because your army values "guts" above "education."
I'm begging you--if you won't hold your fire around the temple, at least remove any artifacts for preservation. I can't do this alone.
Every shot we fire turns the past here to dust.
